item.title: Julia Fractal on Julia
item.description: I wanted a background that would update automatically in some interesting way, instead of just random images. After some thought, I decided to use some Julia fractals. I made a code to create the Julia fractals in the Julia language, and then some code to run it for a random point. The code is here, including some explaining on how to use and install it. Here are some examples:
